authors: Obi, with major help from BigWhoop. Also super special thanks to John W. and Matt Zaldivar. I based this work off of their VTR and V20 sheets.
instructions: When rolling using the roll templates, note how the hunger dice works. If the Hunger Dice exceedes your Dice Pool in total dice rolled, just take the first ones that equal that dicepool. You will have to hover over the Hunger dice box until we are able to script a solution.
